shapeMap
Class Shape

java.lang.Object
  shapeMap.Shape

public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object

A shape for use with a ShapeMap, consisting of a set of X and Y points whose values should be between -1 and 1.

Field Summary

xPoints

public float[] xPoints

yPoints

public float[] yPoints
Constructor Detail

Shape

public Shape()
Create an empty shape

Shape

public Shape(float[] xPoints,
             float[] yPoints)
Create a shape with the specified points. The values of both the x and y points should be between -1 and 1, this is what is expected by the shape map and glyhps.

Parameters:
xPoints - the x coordinates of the shape, between -1 and 1
yPoints - the y coordinates of the shape, between -1 and 1

Shape

public Shape(java.util.List<java.lang.Number> xPoints,
             java.util.List<java.lang.Number> yPoints)
Create a shape with the specified points. The values of both the x and y points should be between -1 and 1, this is what is expected by the shape map and glyhps.

Parameters:
xPoints - the x coordinates of the shape, between -1 and 1
yPoints - the y coordinates of the shape, between -1 and 1
